content.question: Directions: You will hear a brief conversation between two speakers. The exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Tant mieux, mais je savais que ce n’était pas sérieux.
Merveilleux! J’espère que ce sera un garçon.
Génial! Elle va pouvoir partir en vacances l’esprit tranquille.
Si elle avait su, elle aurait étudié davantage.

content.answer: Génial! Elle va pouvoir partir en vacances l’esprit tranquille.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
